channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

item.title: Report X-2023080056
item.description:
Report X-2023080056

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-16T06:13:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-25
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was called to unload trailer 55734 and pkg was wet and leaking out. DescribePack: Closure came loose and liquid leaked out soiling outer carton. DurationRel: 10 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. was placed inside a lined tote and was taken to hazmat cage to get inspected,

item.title: Report X-2023080267
item.description:
Report X-2023080267

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-10T21:10:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-24
  • City: AURORA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered leaking in the load side. It was placed into a damage tote complete with liner. Once brought to QA, it was discovered that one of the caps had come off of the container, allowing the contents to leak freely. DescribePack: Cap off completely DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into a damage tote with liner, orientation arrows being observed.

item.title: Report X-2023070226
item.description:
Report X-2023070226

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-16T06:13:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-30
  • City: LONGMONT
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS UNLOADED ONTO THE BELT. PARTWAY DOWN THE BELT IT WAS NOTICED THAT THE CORNER OF PACKAGE APPEARED WET. BELT WAS STOPPED AND DESIGNATED RESPONDER CALLED. PACKAGE WAS CONTANED AND TRANSPORTED TO HAZMAT AREA BY DESIGNATED RESPONDER FOR PROCESSING

item.title: Report X-2023070062
item.description:
Report X-2023070062

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-27
  • City: COMMERCE CITY
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: A SIX PART HAZMAT WAS CALLED IN AS LEAKING IN THE UNLOAD. USING THE PROPER UTENSILS, THE PACKAGE WAS CLEANED UP AND BROUGHT BACK TO THE DMP PROCESSING AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. RESPONDER DISCOVERED ONE OF THE CAPS WERE LOOSE.

item.title: Report X-2023061365
item.description:
Report X-2023061365
